Sindir Surya Paloh Bertemu PKS, Jokowi: Rangkulannya Tak Biasa
06 Nov 2019, 13:28 by Ahmad Faiz Ibnu Sani, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi menggoda Ketua Umum Partai NasDem, Surya Paloh, terkait pertemuannya dengan Presiden Partai Keadilan Sejahtera, Sohibul Iman, pekan lalu. Godaan ini Jokowi ucapkan saat ia memberikan sambutan di acara peringatan ulang tahun ke-55 Partai Golkar.
Dalam sambutannya, Jokowi mula-mula menyapa para tamu-tamu yang hadir seperti mantan wakil presiden Jusuf Kalla, dan para tokoh senior Golkar. Saat menyapa para ketua umum partai baru lah Jokowi melontarkan godaannya untuk Surya.
"Para Ketua Umum partai yang hadir. Bapak Surya Paloh yang kalau kita lihat malam hari ini lebih cerah dari biasanya. Sehabis pertemuan beliau dengan Pak Sohibul Iman di PKS," kata Jokowi di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Menurut Jokowi, wajah Surya yang terlihat lebih cerah karena habis berangkulan dengan Sohibul. Jokowi menilai rangkulan itu tidak seperti biasa.
"Saya tidak tahu maknanya tapi rangkulannya tidak biasa. Tidak pernah saya dirangkul seperti itu," ucap mantan gubernur DKI Jakarta ini.
Jokowi bercerita telah menanyakan maksud pertemuan Surya dengan petinggi partai oposisi pemerintah ini saat keduanya bertemu di ruang tunggu. "Saya tanya ada apa tapi jawabnya lain waktu. Saya tanya dong karena beliau masih di koalisi pemerintah," ucap dia.
Surya dan Sohibul bertemu pada Rabu, 30 Oktober 2019 di Kantor DPP PKS di Jalan TB Simatupang, Jakarta Selatan. Usai bertemu keduanya mengekspresikan kedekatannya dengan berangkulan.
Ketua DPP Partai NasDem Willy Aditya mengatakan ada tiga kesepakatan yang dari pertemuan Surya dan Sohibul. Pertama, masing-masing partai menghargai dan menghormati posisi mereka dalam pemerintahan.
Adapun poin kedua, NasDem dan PKS sama-sama mengedepankan akhlak karimah saat mengeluarkan pernyataan di depan publik. Willy mengungkapkan NasDem dan PKS sejatinya memiliki rencana sejak dua tahun lalu untuk mengadakan workshop komunikasi politik bagi para kadernya. Sementara poin terakhir adalah, kedua partai sepakat menjaga nilai-nilai kebangsaan Pancasila dan memerangi radikalisme serta intoleransi.
text:
Sindir Surya Paloh Meets PKS, Jokowi: The Embraces Are Unusual
06 Nov 2019, 13:28 by Ahmad Faiz Ibnu Sani, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - President Joko Widodo or Jokowi teased the Chairman of the NasDem Party, Surya Paloh, regarding his meeting with the President of the Prosperous Justice Party, Sohibul Iman, last week. This temptation Jokowi said when he gave a speech at the 55th anniversary of the Golkar Party.
In his remarks, Jokowi first greeted the guests who attended such as former vice president Jusuf Kalla, and senior Golkar figures. It was when greeting the new party chairmen that Jokowi threw his temptation for Surya.
"The Chairmen of the party are present. Mr. Surya Paloh who if we see tonight is brighter than usual. After his meeting with Mr. Sohibul Iman at PKS," Jokowi said at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
According to Jokowi, Surya's face looked brighter because he had embraced with Sohibul. Jokowi considered the embrace to be unusual.
"I don't know the meaning but the embrace is unusual. I have never been embraced like that," said the former governor of DKI Jakarta.
Jokowi said that he had asked about the purpose of Surya's meeting with the leaders of the government opposition party when the two met in the waiting room. "I asked what was wrong, but he answered another time. I asked, because he was still in the government coalition," he said.
Surya and Sohibul met on Wednesday, October 30, 2019 at the PKS DPP Office on Jalan TB Simatupang, South Jakarta. After meeting the two expressed their closeness with embracing.
NasDem Party DPP Chairman Willy Aditya said there were three agreements from the Surya and Sohibul meeting. First, each party respects and respects their position in the government.
As for the second point, NasDem and PKS both prioritize karimah morals when issuing statements in public. Willy revealed that NasDem and PKS actually had plans since two years ago to hold a political communication workshop for their cadres. While the last point is, the two parties agreed to maintain the national values of Pancasila and fight radicalism and intolerance.
